turns.content: write a new song for lizzo in the form of an apology

Verse 1:
I know I hurt you, I can't deny it
I was blinded by my own ego, I couldn't see it
But now I realize, I've been so foolish
I'm sorry for the pain that I caused, oh oh

Chorus:
I'm sorry Lizzo, for all the times I let you down
I'm sorry for the hurt and the sorrow I've found
I'll do better, I'll be there for you now
I'm sorry Lizzo, please forgive me somehow

Verse 2:
I should have listened, I should have been there
But I was caught up in my own affairs
I took you for granted, I let you slip away
But now I see the error of my ways, oh oh

Chorus:
I'm sorry Lizzo, for all the times I let you down
I'm sorry for the hurt and the sorrow I've found
I'll do better, I'll be there for you now
I'm sorry Lizzo, please forgive me somehow

Bridge:
I know I can't take back the past
But I promise to make it right, to make it last
I'll be there for you, through thick and thin
I'm sorry Lizzo, please let me in

Chorus:
I'm sorry Lizzo, for all the times I let you down
I'm sorry for the hurt and the sorrow I've found
I'll do better, I'll be there for you now
I'm sorry Lizzo, please forgive me somehow
awesome can you make it sound like a sea shanty?

Sure! Here's a sea shanty version of the apology song:

Verse 1:
I know I wronged you, can't you see
I was blinded by my own vanity
But now I realize, I've been a fool
I'm sorry for the heartache that I caused, oh oh

Chorus:
I'm sorry Lizzo, for all the times I let you down
I'm sorry for the pain that I've found
I'll do better, I'll be there for you now
I'm sorry Lizzo, please forgive me somehow

Verse 2:
I should have listened, I should have been there
But I was caught up in my own affairs
I took you for granted, I let you slip away
But now I see the error of my ways, oh oh

Chorus:
I'm sorry Lizzo, for all the times I let you down
I'm sorry for the pain that I've found
I'll do better, I'll be there for you now
I'm sorry Lizzo, please forgive me somehow

Bridge:
I know I can't take back the past
But I promise to make it right, to make it last
I'll be there for you, through thick and thin
I'm sorry Lizzo, please let me in

Chorus:
I'm sorry Lizzo, for all the times I let you down
I'm sorry for the pain that I've found
I'll do better, I'll be there for you now
I'm sorry Lizzo, please forgive me somehow

Outro:
I'm sorry Lizzo, I'm sorry Lizzo
I'll make it right, I'll make it right
I'm sorry Lizzo, I'm sorry Lizzo
Please forgive me now, please forgive me now
ok write a new sea shanty about bad manhattans made with vermouth that's gone sour

Verse 1:
I set sail from port one day
With a thirst that wouldn't go away
I sought out a bar on the shore
But the manhattan they served me was a sorry bore

Chorus:
Oh the manhattans, they tasted sour
With vermouth that had gone bad in the hour
I should have known, I should have fled
But the manhattans, they left me for dead

Verse 2:
I asked for a drink, just one more
But the bartender, he shook his head
He said "I'm sorry mate, the vermouth's gone bad
You'll have to find another drink instead"

Chorus:
Oh the manhattans, they tasted sour
With vermouth that had gone bad in the hour
I should have known, I should have fled
But the manhattans, they left me for dead

Bridge:
I begged for a chance, just one more round
But the bartender, he stood his ground
He said "I'm sorry mate, it's time to go
The manhattans, they've left you low"

Chorus:
Oh the manhattans, they tasted sour
With vermouth that had gone bad in the hour
I should have known, I should have fled
But the manhattans, they left me for dead

Outro:
Oh the manhattans, they tasted sour
I'll never forget that fateful hour
I'll stick to rum, or maybe gin
But the manhattans, they'll never win
